trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Glenside
There were no other sightings in Glenside on or around October 10th 2010
divs: sighting details at 7pm eastern standard time,october 10,2010. i was finishing up some yard work and happened to look up and notice a large glowing sphere that was traveling from the south\west heading north\east. it was at a fairly high altitude and moving slowly at about satelite speed in a strait line. gaged by an aircraft that in the vacinity of the object and also at fairly high altitude the object was considerably larger than plane. it's color was glowing as if flame was inside,orange\red. of course, i was unable to find the camera and no pics are available. object was not any conventional aircraft,blimp or afterburner type effect. could you please notify me if there were any other sightings of this object last night or of any possible explanations. thank you for your time, *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
